thread.title: Customer Greg Bayduss
thread.title_full: Mavis Discount Tire reviewed by Customer Greg Bayduss

author: Customer Greg Bayduss
title: Customer Greg Bayduss
text: Brought my car in to repair a slow leak. I was greeted in a courteous manner and the staff quickly responded to my concerns. the problem was discovered and repaired in a timely manner and the staff were very cordial and accommodating
